mods.abstract: Performance of I Heard My Name On The Radio, written by Albert Brumley, performed by the King's Sacred Quartet [unconfirmed] which consisted of Johnnie Wright, Jack Anglin, Ray Atkins, and Clyde Moody. Mention of a previous performance with Harmie Smith in Warren, Tex., mention of an upcoming performance with Johnnie & Jack and the Tennessee Mountain Boys and Harmie Smith on at a high school auditorium, and mention of upcoming performance on Friday, January 7th (most likely either 1944 or 1949).
